mapper.sql: ID, KCXH, VERSION, UPDATEVERSION, URL, DESCRIPTION, CZRYZH, CZSJ
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_PDA_VERSION (ID, BMBH, VERSION, URL, DESCRIPTION, CZRYZH, CZSJ,DICTIONARY) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{czryzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictionary,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into SYS_PDA_VERSION
ID,
KCXH,
VERSION,
UPDATEVERSION,
URL,
DESCRIPTION,
CZRYZH,
CZSJ,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{kcxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{czryzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update SYS_PDA_VERSION
KCXH = #{kcxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEVERSION = #{updateversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=OTHER},
CZRYZH = #{czryzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CZSJ = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_PDA_VERSION set KCXH = #{kcxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEVERSION = #{updateversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=OTHER}, CZRYZH = #{czryzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZSJ = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT bmbh,version,url,description,dictionary FROM sys_pda_version WHERE bmbh = #{0} ORDER BY czsj desc) t where rownum = 1
